Sudah 5 Jam, Petugas Damkar Masih Sisir Titik Api di Gedung Kosong Hailai
05 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Petugas pemadam kebakaran masih berupaya melakukan pemadaman secara menyeluruh di gedung Hailai yang terbakar. Petugas masih menyisir titik api.
"Masih proses pemadaman. Ini lokasi karena gedung bertingkat. Gedungnya lumayan luas, yang terbakar di tiap tingkat, jadi harus nyisir ke semua, satu lantai dulu, terus lantai dua," kata petugas Sudin Damkar Jakut, Udin, saat dikonfirmasi, Selasa (5/11/2019) pukul 04.00 WIB.
Udin melanjutkan gedung yang terbakar merupakan bangunan yang sudah tidak terpakai. Dia juga memastikan bangunan arena boling tidak terdampak kebakaran.
"(Gedung Hailai) bersebelahan dengan gedung boling. Gedung Hailainya kosong sementara. Berdekatan, bukan boling (terbakar)," jelas Udin.
Sementara itu, Sekretaris Kampung Siaga Bencana (KSB) Ancol, Amar menjelaskan, api mulai berkobar pada Senin (4/11) malam pukul 22.50 WIB. Api dengan cepat melalap Gedung Hailai diduga karena angin kencang dan material mudah terbakar yang ada di dalam gedung.
"Jadi saat ini sedang ada tahap pembongkaran oleh kontraktor yang bongkar, jadi konstruksi ada proses pengelasan. Kalau sumber api diduga dari hasil pekerjaan las itu. Cuma waktu kejadian sudah tidak ada waktu pengerjaan, pengerjaan berhenti pukul 17.00 WIB. Jadi ini kayaknya sisa besi masih panas, terus di bawah juga banyak material busa, kayak busa sofa, jadi mungkin angin juga agak kenceng jadi tiba-tiba besar (api)," jelas Amar saat dihubungi terpisah.
Sekadar informasi, Kampung Siaga Bencana berada di bawah naungan Suku Dinas Sosial Jakarta. Di Jakarta Utara, sudah ada 16 KSB yang terbentuk.
Kembali ke Amar, dia menuturkan, bangunan yang terbakar merupakan eks gedung Hailai Club. Menurutnya, bangunan itu sudah lama kosong.
"Lokasi boling Ancol ini aman, nggak kebakar. Boling itu ada sebelah timurnya gedung Hailai, memang berdempetan, tapi boling nggak terbakar, yang terbakar ini eks Hailai Club. Saya tadi cek ke boling, masih aman. Malah Waktu saya sampai, banyak yang lari dari sana, masih ada aktivitas boling," kata Amar.

Already 5 Hours, Damkar Officers Still Combing Hotspots in the Hailai Empty Building
05 Nov 2019, 04:20 by Indra Komara
Jakarta - Firefighters are still trying to do a comprehensive blackout in the burning Hailai building. Officers are still combing hotspots.
"It's still a blackout process. This is the location because of the multi-storey building. The building is quite large, which burns at each level, so it must be combed to all, first floor, then second floor," said Sudin Damkar Jakut officer, Udin, when confirmed, Tuesday (5) / 11/2019) at 04.00 WIB.
Udin continued that the burning building was a building that was no longer used. He also made sure the bowling alley building was not affected by fire.
"(The Hailai Building) is next to the bowling building. The Hailai Building is temporarily empty. Adjacent, not bowling (burning)," Udin explained.
Meanwhile, the Secretary of the Ancol Disaster Preparedness Village (KSB), Amar explained, the fire started burning on Monday (11/4) night at 22.50 WIB. The fire quickly engulfed the Hailai Building, allegedly due to strong winds and flammable materials inside the building.
"So there is currently a demolition stage by the contractor who is unloading, so the construction is in the process of welding. If the source of the fire is suspected from the results of the welding work. Only when the incident happened there was no time to work, the work stopped at 17.00 WIB. So this seems like the remaining iron remains heat, then under a lot of foam material, like foam sofa, so maybe the wind is a bit too thick so suddenly it is big (fire), "explained Amar when contacted separately.
For your information, the Disaster Prepared Village is under the auspices of the Jakarta Social Service Tribe. In North Jakarta, there have been 16 KSB formed.
Back to Amar, he said, the burning building was a former Hailai Club building. According to him, the building has long been empty.
"The location of the Ancol bowling is safe, not burned. The bowling is east of the Hailai building, it is indeed close together, but the bowling did not catch fire, this burning was a former Hailai Club. I was checking into the bowling alley, still safe. from there, there is still bowling activity, "Amar said.
